name: Alec Bradley - Coyol - Petit Lancero
additionalNotes: La Vega Coyol is one of our exclusive farms in Honduras, named after the majestic Coyol palm tree that stands at its entrance. Sharing the same fertile soil of the palm, the tobaccos cultivated from La Vega Coyol exhibit great flavor and wonderful aromatics. Alan blended Alec Bradley Coyol for the cigar enthusiast who appreciates rich flavor and aroma. Like a fine wine, Coyol is a cigar whose name honors its roots and the land that gave it character.Â Honduran-made, medium to full-bodied blend into the sumptuous spotlight of savory nuances synonymous with satisfaction. Coyol enlists a sultry Honduran wrapper characterized by sweet hints of nutmeg and dried fruits. Carefully crafted Honduran and Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos stimulate a leathery spiciness.
